Makes your [[agent]] destroy a block or item in the specified direction.

==Syntax==

: <code>destroy <direction: string></code>

==Arguments==

<code>direction: string</code>
: Specifies the direction of Agent to destroy.
: Must be one of:
:* <code>forward</code> to destroy block/item on the front.
:* <code>back</code> to destroy block/item on the back.
:* <code>left</code> to destroy block/item on the left-hand side.
:* <code>right</code> to destroy block/item on the right-hand side.
:* <code>up</code> to destroy block/item on the top-hand side.
:* <code>down</code> to destroy block/item on the bottom-hand side.

==Result==

Fails if the block was unbreakable or a non-solid block.

On success, the Agent destroys the block/item by one hit as expected.
